privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how SugarFree collects, uses, and shares your information when you use our website and app (the “Service”). By using the Service you agree to these practices.
privacy.definitionsDesc: Capitalized words have meanings defined in this section and apply equally to singular and plural.
privacy.personalDataDesc: We may ask for your email, first and last name, phone number and any information you submit through forms.
privacy.usageDataDesc: Collected automatically, e.g., IP address, browser type and version, pages visited, time spent, device identifiers and diagnostics. On mobile we may receive device type and OS.
privacy.cookiesDesc: We use cookies, beacons and scripts to improve and analyze the Service. You can set your browser to refuse cookies, but some parts may not function properly.
privacy.use.1: Provide and maintain the Service, including usage monitoring.
privacy.use.2: Manage your account and user features.
privacy.use.3: Perform contracts and purchases within the Service.
privacy.use.4: Contact you by email, phone, SMS or push notifications.
privacy.use.5: Send updates and offers related to SugarFree (you may opt out).
privacy.share.1: Service providers who operate and analyze the Service.
privacy.share.2: Business transfers such as mergers or acquisitions.
privacy.share.3: Affiliates and partners under this same commitment.
privacy.share.4: Public areas where information you share may be visible.
privacy.share.5: With your consent for other purposes.
privacy.retentionDesc: We keep data as long as needed for the purposes described and to comply with the law. Data may be processed in other jurisdictions with adequate safeguards.
privacy.rightsDesc: You can request access, update or deletion of your data via our contact page. Some information may be retained when legally required.
privacy.securityDesc: We apply reasonable measures to protect your data, but no method is 100% secure.
privacy.childrenDesc: The Service is not intended for children under 13 and we do not knowingly collect data from them.
privacy.linksDesc: We may include links to third‑party sites. We are not responsible for their practices.
privacy.changesDesc: We may update this policy and will post the current version with the updated date.
